# roylloCoin

TODO Update with what we did in production.

```bash
docker exec -it 9e26560b40cf tapcli assets mint \
                --type normal \
                --name roylloCoin \
                --supply 10000 \
                --meta_bytes "roylloCoin by Royllo"
```

We emit the transaction.

```bash
docker exec -it 9e26560b40cf \
                tapcli assets mint finalize
```

Creation result:

```json
{
  "version": "ASSET_VERSION_V0",
  "asset_genesis": {
    "genesis_point": "04feaf85babeeb5662e1139edd48b889ec178880cc69bbe38b5820dae322c75b:0",

    "meta_hash": "e342a303a484ac7fead42c7bc8590000c10fa801f1e7c6c59bd47b360171dfee",

    "output_index": 0,
    "version": 0
  },
  "asset_type": "NORMAL",
  "amount": "10000",

  "relative_lock_time": 0,

  "asset_group": null,

    "anchor_tx": "",

  "is_burn": false

```

Corresponding proof can be retrieved with:

```bash
docker exec -it 9e26560b40cf \
       tapcli proofs export \
       --asset_id ce5a426ea282d2dee3a2eb48170231403ee4768be17f73fef8e6f925d30797af \
       --script_key 025d615b377761a5bfcfe84f0f11afd35837a68f702dd8a0cac0a2a4052b20d211
```

is: ``
